transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir actually system nahi hoga aapke paas kyuki aisa hai na voice call me aapko bata. 
(silence)
(music)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir aap phone se jab join kar rahe ho na meeting to ye wali call aapki hold pe ho ja rahi hai. 
Customer: To computer vagaira nahi hoga aapke paas join karne ke liye. 
Customer: Ya kuch time baad aap arrange. 
Customer: Agar sir laptop se kar lo.
(silence)
Customer: Waha pe kaha se ji join karna hai laptop me.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Bola to tha sir system se kar lena join.
Customer: Usi wale link se kar lena usi wale link se ho jayega join.
(silence)
(silence)
Customer: Ab kaha se karna hai bolo.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Google Chrome me jana hai kya.
Executive: Sir isme dekh mai batati hu aapko aapki email id login hogi system me.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jo hamare sath registered hai usi pe dekho jo email aayi thi na mere naam se usi pe click karna hai aapko meeting pane ke liye.
(silence)
(silence)
Customer: Ya agar aapko time lagega sir matlab we lunch lunch break hai to mai lunch ja ke karu aapko 3 baje ke aas paas call.
Customer: Nahi dekh phir aake aap mujhe wo bhejo to waha pe ho jayega nahi dekh ke aao na pehle.
Customer: Achcha to mai lunch ja ke karu phir aapko 3 baje.
Customer: Thik hai to koi baat nahi.
Customer: Haan to sir aap na google aap kya karna laptop pe na aap ya to whatsapp login kar lena mai aapko whatsapp pe share kar dungi link thik hai ya phir aapke jo
Customer: WhatsApp pe kar doge to chalega whatsapp hai.
Executive: Thik hai to mai whatsapp pe.
Customer: WhatsApp link pe bhej dena.
Executive: Thik hai to mai whatsapp pe aapko bhej deti hu aake thik hai 3 baje accurate mai aapko connect karti hu thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay okay thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join meeting via phone.

- Customer needs assistance to join via laptop.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive will connect at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share meeting link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, whatsapp, link, laptop
